public class KawaAppEvent
extends KawaEvent
Event returned for application level events.

APP_CLOSING
Indicates application is closing
APP_OPENED
Indicates application has been initialized

KawaAppEvent(int)
Constructor for creating a Kawa event.

APP_OPENED 
 public static final int APP_OPENED
Indicates application has been initialized

APP_CLOSING 
 public static final int APP_CLOSING
Indicates application is closing

KawaAppEvent 
 public KawaAppEvent(int eventID)
Constructor for creating a Kawa event.

Parameters:
eventID - ID of the event.
